title: Please ban this. You must act Riot
body:
Just encountered a player who went smite xerath conquer support.  It was my last game look at match history. I eventually bought relic to maybe help our adc. He told us in chat he needed to lose and gave us his op.gg link. He literally lost 27 straight ranked games on troll smite supports. Then will win one yasuo game and continue the spree. How do you lose 27 straight games as a smite support with no punishment riot? He tells us in game he was trying to get his account to bronze. Yet I have gotten an account banned for saying loser and idiot to players like this. You need to fix your system. This is actually disgusting. Not to mention he followed me around my jungle taking everything from the start to the finish


( Riot has just perma banned me for this game. because i apparently int fed. and not the xerath. heart broken . )

And you cant even type a word against them because you probably will get ban for abuse.

Pretty odd how much this board has changed. It wasn't too long ago where any post pointing out the flaws or discontent with Riots system would be downvoted. This isn't a new problem, its been an issue for years. Why are people only now starting to realize it?
Send a support ticket so the right people see it - only a few of the devs and community staff frequent the boards
Is that worth it? In your opinion you think they might do something? Haven't done that before
I've submitted tickets before for severe verbal abuse or obvious inting. Every time I have, like 4 or so, they respond saying they cannot do anything and that I need make sure to report in client.

This is very dependent on the player support person you get.  I've gotten people intentionally griefing games banned through tickets.  They still encourage the ingame reports, but it can't detect intentionally losing games like this atm.  They are working to improve it apparently is last word I've heard regarding it.

While I'm at it, how many people here even realize you're seeing less than half of the person you play in game with? There's a LOT of information you're missing in most cases, and although people like the hardcore "inter" in OP are horrible, most of their cover comes from people over-blowing details about teammates they THINK are inting when they don't even know for sure, 90% or more of the "omg this guy ruined my ranked game" posts are usually a load of bull written by a salty teammate who can't accept that they just had a bad game or has a condition like nerve issues in their hand(which makes sifting through the pile to find the legitimate grievances that much harder), and that's not even factoring in stuff like if a person is grieving for a lost family member or something and trying to take their mind off of it with a little League.

 Bottom line, it's a COMMUNITY problem, Riot's not trying to ruin your climb, other members of the community are, so be a member of the community and submit tickets/reports, and don't try to get someone banned unless they 100% deserve it and you can prove it, otherwise you're just making more smoke to help hide the worst people while they go about their nastiness.
